title: The Great Storyteller - Novel Updates
genre: Mature   Psychological   School Life   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Famous Protagonist   Friendship   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Low-key Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Quirky Characters   Second Chance   Time Skip   Writers
author: Im Han Baeg   임한백
description:
Yun Woo is the youngest author in history to enter the literature world. His debut work was a massive hit but this success was short lived for the unprepared.

A miraculous second chance comes his way one day.

This is the beginning of that journey.>
